boq_context:
Sl. No. | PART NO | ITEM NO | DESCRIPTION | QTY | UOM | RATE | AMOUNT | TPPL Estimate | TPPL Amount
734 | 0 | 01QP | PROJECTS |  |  |  |  |  | 
735 | 0 | 01QP.MI01 | PRE-COMMISSIONING / COMMISSIONING ASSISTANCE: PRE-COMMISSIONING / COMMISSIONING ASSISTANCE:                 Carrying out pre-commissioning / Commissioning activities such as dropping the valves, control valves and spool pieces, air and water flushing and air-blasting, steam blowing, air drying, re-installing the valves, control valves and spool pieces, leak testing etc. as per pre-commissioning / Commissioning specification/ procedure and instruction of Engineer In- Charge including supply of necessary hand tools,    Equipment/ Machinery, consumables (electrodes, filler wire, gas, card board, target plate, scaffolding etc. wherever required) and with single point responsibility of Contractor's supervision.                 Note: This manpower will be utilized for Pre-commissioning & Commissioning requirement over and above that already described elsewhere in this SOR. One Man Day is 12-hour duty. |  |  |  |  |  |
header_rows: Sl. No. | PART NO | ITEM NO | DESCRIPTION | QTY | UOM | RATE | AMOUNT | TPPL Estimate | TPPL Amount

products_entries.section_context_for_this_product_block: PROJECTS; PRE-COMMISSIONING / COMMISSIONING ASSISTANCE: PRE-COMMISSIONING / COMMISSIONING ASSISTANCE: Carrying out pre-commissioning / Commissioning activities such as dropping the valves, control valves and spool pieces, air and water flushing and air-blasting, steam blowing, air drying, re-installing the valves, control valves and spool pieces, leak testing etc. as per pre-commissioning / Commissioning specification/ procedure and instruction of Engineer In- Charge including supply of necessary hand tools, Equipment/ Machinery, consumables (electrodes, filler wire, gas, card board, target plate, scaffolding etc. wherever required) and with single point responsibility of Contractor's supervision. Note: This manpower will be utilized for Pre-commissioning & Commissioning requirement over and above that already described elsewhere in this SOR. One Man Day is 12-hour duty.
products_entries.full_product_description: PRE-COMMISSIONING / COMMISSIONING ASSISTANCE: PRE-COMMISSIONING / COMMISSIONING ASSISTANCE: Carrying out pre-commissioning / Commissioning activities such as dropping the valves, control valves and spool pieces, air and water flushing and air-blasting, steam blowing, air drying, re-installing the valves, control valves and spool pieces, leak testing etc. as per pre-commissioning / Commissioning specification/ procedure and instruction of Engineer In- Charge including supply of necessary hand tools, Equipment/ Machinery, consumables (electrodes, filler wire, gas, card board, target plate, scaffolding etc. wherever required) and with single point responsibility of Contractor's supervision. Note: This manpower will be utilized for Pre-commissioning & Commissioning requirement over and above that already described elsewhere in this SOR. One Man Day is 12-hour duty. SKILLED MANPOWER LIKE Fitter/Welder/ Gas cutter/ Grinder/ Fabricator (WITH HAND TOOLS, EQUIPMENT/ MACHINERY, CONSUMABLES)
products_entries.feature_or_specifications: type: fitter, type: welder, type: gas cutter, type: grinder, type: fabricator, tools: with hand tools, equipment: with equipment/ machinery, consumables: with consumables
